song.englishname: I Will Give Thanks to The Lord

english.segment1: I will give thanks to the lord. With all my heart. I wil tell of all thy wonders. I will be glad and exult in thee
english.segment2: I will trust in you my god. Who delivered me. And lifted me from the gates of death. I will be glad and exult in thee
english.segment3: I will give thanks to the lord. With all my heart. I will tell of all thy wonders. I will be glad and exult in thee
english.segment4: I will tell of all thy wonders. I will be glad and exult in thee
